original_title: 檻の中の純愛少女 変態教師に恋した少女は男の全てを受け入れる…歪み過ぎた純愛ペットと監禁先生
overview: [Too distorted confinement x pure love drama] A male teacher who was trusted by his students was found to have stolen a female student's underwear one day and was dismissed from his job and withdrew. One of the students "Uika" came to such a perverted teacher. Her male teacher holds a distorted feeling to her who offers her own underwear with her pure feeling. A distorted romantic relationship between a perverted teacher and a girl who wants to be imprisoned in a cage...
title: Pure Love in a Cage – Girl Who Fell in Love with Perverted Teacher – Accepts All of his Distorted Pure Love – Confinement pet for the Teacher – Noa ika
